document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Susan </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">stranger </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ones </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">cite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">most </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">never </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">scaled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Haunted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">House </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">compromised </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Ghost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">pity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">helped </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">regret </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">less </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">nearer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">get </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: What mystery pervades a well!
